features: Realistic Appearance: Made out of a high-quality sturdy plastic material which makes it impact-proof and difficult to break for kids making it run smoothly on flat hard floors.

Smart Motion Sensor: The Airbus airplane toys for 3-year-old is an advanced modern toy which has a smart built it 'Bump and Go' system. Anytime it is about to hit an obstacle, it turns right and will re-route its direction
Colorful Lights and Sound: Catch your child's attention with the super cool LED flashing lights, and real jet engine sound of an airplane toy which can be easily switched ON and OFF at any time.
Easy to Assemble: Our kids airplane toy require 3 AA batteries. Just put the batteries in and fit the wings and the plane is ready to fly!
Great Gift for Kids: Surprise your little ones with this realistic airplane toys for children with smart flashing LED lights & jet sound, an excellent gift for Birthday and Christmas

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly a fun toy!
reviews.reviewText: I think its a great gift for 2-4 years olds. The airplane has lots of bright and colorful lights and music. Once you turn it on, it keeps moving around until we turn it off. If it bumps into something, it'll automatically back up and turn into some other direction and keeps moving again.The speakers are a loud and so we put some tape on the speaker holes to cover them up but otherwise it's a fun toy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My daughter is very interested in airplane so I bought her this for Christmas. The assembly was really quick and the lights on it are very pretty and the music is cute too! It moves around the floor very nicely, and once it hits something it backs up and moves around it nicely, it's quite entertaining to watch!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Durability Except For The Power Switch
reviews.reviewText: The plane itself has good durability. Sometimes the wings might come off because of crashing it into the ground or something, but they can be reattached. It has a cheap audio track but great for young kids. As a parent it does get annoying after a while, ha! It moves on the ground as it has one of those two-wheeled spinning things on the bottom. And a lot of lights!The downside to this toy is the durability of the power switch. I've only owned it for a few months and now the power switch has to be put into a specific slider position and sometimes even pushed on to get the plane to receive power. I will have to get it a replacement, sturdier switch at some point. Otherwise it's a good product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My grandson loves this plane. It has more lights than I was expecting and when it hits a wall it changes direction and keeps going. Best airplane for the money 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars One wing won’t light up.
reviews.reviewText: 7-25-2022: Ok this is an update! I ordered a replacement because one of the wings will not work. I will now be sending the replacement back… why you ask? Because when my son switches the toy to on, all I see are what visions of what hell must be like! I literally checked my ears to make sure they weren’t bleeding! This toy manufacturer is sadistic! What heartless person creates a toy so loud and on an endless 5 second loop. I mean over and Over and OVER again! I put the broken toy in the box and my son found it… mind you, it was 7:30 am. I awoke from my sleep screaming, “NOOOO!” My son had a huge smile on his face as if he enjoyed the fact that I was not only scared of the blaring, loud music, but that genuinely torchers my soul! Please… if you are a parent and you are reading this… run from purchasing this toy! Run far, run fast! This toy was meant to drive you insane! I don’t want to take a toy away from my son, but I had to be a grown up and say, “NO MORE!” I have decided to put my sanity first! The cool flashing lights and the huge smile on my sons face is not enough to ignore this particular evil. I know that this is a cheap toy but they could have put a switch or button that operates the music. They did not and they know what they are doing! Good riddance to this toy! I don’t care if I get my money back… it will either be returned or destroyed with a hammer. You have been warned! God Bless!___________________Bought this for my 3yr old son’s birthday. Cool toy, but one of the wings won’t light up. New out of box. This toy is also very loud with no volume control. I mean it’s only $25 bucks so you get what you pay for. I am sending this one back for a new one because my son likes the toy. I am also going to use tape to cover the sound holes so that it’s not so loud!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don't buy this.
reviews.reviewText: Wow what a waste of money. First if falls apart so easily! Second the plastic is so cheap the wheels have already broken off. The little plastic caps won't stay on. Just junk honestly. I had such high hopes cause the reviews but really don't waste your money. Also omg it is so darn loud. Had to put tape over the speaker and still loud. Got this for my son for Xmas btw.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Grandson loved it!
reviews.reviewText: My 3 yr old grandson loved it. He slept with it! But it makes way too much noise for me. Good buy for kids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Grandson loved this
reviews.reviewText: Great buy for child who likes airplanes
they sure aren't durable but man they had a lot of fun with these especially at night. 8/9/10 year old boys
The wings broke right away, the spring in the gun popped out. Good if you only want to play with it couple times.
My son touch it gently and the pieces fallen apart! Cheaply designed and made.
This is a great toy, but very NOISY and has no volume control. My grandson loves planes and he is crazy about this one.
